item.title: Magical Thinking
item.description: 00:43:00 Axel explores weather he is a sociapath with Wendy Rhoades. WENDY: It is a crucial time. Your switchplate is removed, your wires are exposed. Your blue ones go where your red ones are, that’s for sure. a normal person wouldn’t engage in the behavior. A sociopath wouldn’t give a shit. You’re somwhere in between. your practiced at turning off your emotions. DO it enough its a pattern, keep going, they die.
